amendment.description: To provide funding for the new beginning for Tribal students program, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1133 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1133 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6311) To provide funding for the new beginning for Tribal students program, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1133 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1133 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 948.
